title: Discworld_Noir_MULTILANGUAGE_eng_esp_ita_PC
description:
Discworld Noir - PC - Multilanguage - English - Spanish - Italian
Install Instructions

   1. Install game (full install)
   2. Replace tin3_dxd.exe, the one in the installation folder, for the one in [CD1]\crack\ folder
   3. Copy NoCDcrack.exe to installation folder and execute it. Press &#039;crack&#039; button.

After this, you should be able to play without the CDs.
Known Issues

Once you launch the game, you will be displayed a &#039;welcome menu&#039; with four buttons (New Game, Load Game...). Well, this menu is crash-prone. Use F1-menu instead.
